channel.title: Looking for a Mantis and Fox Rune
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Looking for a Mantis and Fox Rune"

item.title: Re: Looking for a Mantis and Fox Rune
item.content:encoded: hey, dunno if u read here ill PM in game also but i have mantis rune for trade and i'd like to trade it for ocelot, deal?

item.title: Re: Looking for a Mantis and Fox Rune
item.content:encoded: I already got a fox rune in a trade, however I am still looking for the mantis. PM me if you're looking to trade.

item.title: Looking for a Mantis and Fox Rune
item.content:encoded:
Looking for a Mantis and Fox Rune. I'm willing to trade a group of super rares from the wheel, close to 200 fur squares, an Ocelot Rune, Wolf Rune and Snake rune among other things.

If someone pms me in game offering one or both the runes, I'll open my bucket up to them so they can set up a deal. The name is "Da Bolt"
